resources.string: 为了确保应用能够收集必要数据并显示准确的统计信息，您必须授予后台运行权限。
你的电池很可能是双电芯设计，为了显示正确的电池容量， 您必须在设置中启用功能：“双电芯电流设置” -> “电流校正”。
成功激活高级功能，所有项目已解锁，祝您使用愉快!
如果您喜欢我们的应用，诚邀您给予支持，共同助力它的成长。您的贡献将直接用于优化产品，为您带来更卓越的体验
字体下载失败。请检查网络连接后重试。
添加电量组件到主屏幕
添加温度组件到主屏幕
您的桌面不支持此功能
警告：频繁更新小部件可能会增加电量消耗。
您有未保存的更改，是否在退出前保存？
在部分运行HyperOS 2的设备上，由于系统限制，电池温度数值可能会停止更新，如果出现此情况，重启设备以临时恢复，我们推荐您将系统更新至最新版本，该问题可能得到修复\n感谢您的理解。
充电到 %1$s%%,计入%1$s%%次循环损耗
从低于15%充到100%以显示数据。
这种方法更加便捷，因为它不要求用户充满电。但其精确度可能不如单次计算。若更新统计，请至少充15%电量，注意，在充电次数较少时，电池损耗水平可能与实际情况存在差异。
这种方法更加准确，因为它只考虑上一次完整充电的数据。但是对充电条件要求更高，需要从低于15%充到到100%.为提高数据精度，请勿在完全充电提示前中断。
“你的设备每次充电都会损耗。在此模块中，您可以大致估算，充电至所选百分比电量将对电池造成多少损伤，电池的损耗比例越高，即充电对电池造成的损伤就越大。”

"此模块显示当前或者上次充电信息。如果电池正在充电，则显示当前充电；若在放电，它会显示最近一次充入1%的电量详情。您可以使用“手动重置充电详情”立刻重置数据，可在设置中启用此功能。
 平均速度：总体充电速度。
 屏幕开启：屏幕亮时的充电速度。
 屏幕关闭：屏幕关闭时的充电速度。"

"此模块显示所有充电的平均充电速度，你可以在设置中清除数据库以重置此数据。
 屏幕开启：屏幕亮时的平均充电速度。
 屏幕关闭：屏幕熄灭时的平均充电速度。
 综合使用：基于您充电时的使用情况计算的平均速度。"

"This block displays the average discharging speed for all sessions. You have the option to reset this data by clearing the database in settings.
Screen on is the average speed with the screen on. Screen off is the average speed with the screen off. Combined use is the average speed based on how you use your phone while discharging."

"This block displays the percentage of charge and mah that were spent during the current or last session. If the battery is discharging, the current session will be displayed. If the battery is charging, it will display the last session during which at least 1% was discharged.
Screen on is the amount of interest spent with the screen on. Screen off is the amount of interest spent with the screen turned off."

"This block displays information about the current or last discharging session. If the battery is discharging, the current session will be displayed. If the battery is charging, it will display the last session during which at least 1% was discharged. You have the option to reset this data immediately using "Manual session reset". You can enable this feature in the settings.
Average Speed is the overall discharging speed. Screen on is the discharging speed with the screen on. Screen off is the discharging speed with the screen off."
"This block displays approximate information about the duration of the device from a full battery. This information is based on previously collected data about your use of the device."

"This block displays approximate information about the state of your battery.
The design capacity is the original capacity of the battery, which was specified by the manufacturer. The сalculated capacity is the capacity of the battery that was calculated by this program.
Attention. If your Battery health is less than 50%, then you probably have a dual-cell battery. To fix capacity display you need to enable in settings for dual-cell batteries."

"This block displays information about the battery wear rate. Select the desired percentage and you will find out, approximately, in how many days your battery will be worn down to the selected percentage. The algorithm that calculates this information takes into account the average charge percentage required and the average battery wear per day.
Attention. This feature is experimental and may differ significantly from real data."
"This block displays how long the device will work with the SCREEN ON from the current battery level."
"This block displays how long the device will work from the current battery level, taking into account your usage style."
"This block displays how long the device will work with the SCREEN OFF from the current battery level."

\tTo reduce the rate of wear and increase battery life, it is recommended to keep the battery charge level between 20% and 80%. \n\tWhen the battery reaches more than 20% wear, it is recommended to replace the battery with a new one."
With the current style of use, through
\tThis graph displays the wear rate of the battery over last week. Each column is one day. Height column is the degree of wear that the battery has received on a specific day.
\tThis graph shows how the battery temperature has changed over the time period you select.
The design capacity was determined automatically. If it is not true, you can change it.
Disconnect the device from charging. Diagnostics occurs only when the device is discharging.
The design capacity is the battery capacity declared by the manufacturer in mAh.
Invalid value. It\'s important to specify the correct capacity as it affects some features.
When this feature is enabled, the app will not appear in the Recent Apps list.
When this feature is enabled, the app will automatically close when minimized. The background service will continue running.
If Close on Minimize is disabled, the app will automatically close five minutes after being sent to the background. The background service will continue running.

If you suspect that your device’s amperage readings are inaccurate, you can rerun the diagnostic to recalibrate the scaling factor. You don’t need to run this if your readings are already correct. Would you like to start the diagnostic now?
1. Overlay on top of other windows
Overlay on top of other windows
You need to grant access to BatteryOne to display on top of other windows. The button with the transition to the page is located below.
This permission is not available on all devices, but if you have it, then you need to enable it. Below is a button with a transition to the BatteryOne permissions page.
This permission is also not available on all devices. If you have it, then you need to enable it. The button with the transition to the page is located below.
Use the battery level alert function to keep the battery level normal, thus prolonging battery life.
Using two kinds of algorithms, with BatteryOne, you can calculate the actual capacity of a battery and predict how long it will take for it to become unusable.
BatteryOne collects data gradually to show you the most accurate statistics. It\'s simple, the longer you use BatteryOne, the more accurate the statistics become!

In order to work properly and display the correct data, BatteryOne must be constantly running in the background. If BatteryOne is not running in the background, it will not be able to perform functions such as battery level alerts or other important functions.
Unfortunately, on many devices, the operating system stops the service that collects the necessary battery data. Don\'t Kill My App is a site that helps users solve this problem for various devices.
For versions of Android 11 and above, it has become critical to grant permission to run continuously in the background. Please grant this permission.
Please enable Autorun for BatteryOne so that if the service is killed, it can restart itself.
Permission has already been granted. Thank you!

"We regret to inform you that your device does not have a built-in sensor to measure amperage data. This sensor is crucial for several functions within our application, and without it, many features may not work as intended.
It's important to note that the absence of the amperage sensor is a hardware limitation specific to your device and not a shortcoming of our application. Unfortunately, we rely on the availability of certain hardware features to provide accurate and comprehensive battery information.
We understand that this may be disappointing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact our support team. We appreciate your understanding and value your use of our application."
Some dual-cell battery devices may display the amperage incorrectly, lowering it by half. Use this feature to fix it.
Some dual-cell battery devices may incorrectly display voltage by reporting the voltage of two cells at the same time. Use this function only if your voltage is greater than 7V.
The battery temperature is above normal.
The temperature has reached critical! Cooling required.
Database stabilization is a procedure in which the coefficients data are reduced so that new data has a greater impact on statistics. (Not recommended for frequent use)
Clearing the database entails a complete reset of the usage statistics. This action is irreversible.
We express our sincere gratitude for the purchase of Advanced Access! All functions are unlocked. Happy using!
Support our project by switching to Advanced Access and unlock this and other blocked features. Do you want to switch to Advanced Access?

We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude for your substantial contribution to the ongoing development of BatteryOne. Your support holds immense significance for us, serving as a driving force that propels our efforts forward. Your belief in our project invigorates our team, motivating us to reach new heights of innovation and excellence.
All functions are unlocked. Happy using!

We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude for your substantial contribution to the ongoing development of BatteryOne. Your support holds immense significance for us, serving as a driving force that propels our efforts forward. Your belief in our project invigorates our team, motivating us to reach new heights of innovation and excellence. All functions are unlocked. Happy using!
Purchase successfully found. Advanced Access granted.
Purchase not found. You may have used a different account to make the purchase.
Your subscription will continue until you cancel.
Your database has been successfully imported.
Your database has been successfully exported.
Error service. Please restart the application.

"In this block you can see the operating time of your device with the screen turned off.
"Awake" is the total amount of time the phone used the processor to complete tasks. "Deep sleep" is the total amount of time the phone's processor is idle."
Thanks for your support. Advertising has been removed for 24 hours.
Unfortunately, there are no videos available at the moment. Please try again later.
Watch one advertising video to remove ads for 24 hours. Please note: This feature does not provide the benefits of Advanced Access, it only removes ads.
Failed to connect to Google Play services. Please clear the cache and data of the Google Play application and try again.
The file you selected is not a database.
Error! The selected database does not match the required parameters.
Decryption error! Select the file which is the BatteryOne database.
Please read and accept the privacy policy to continue.
The terms of the privacy policy are accepted. Thanks!
Buy a monthly subscription to Advanced Access with a 50% discount
Shows the percentage of your battery.
For a better experience using the widget, you can grant access to the internal memory.
In order to use this feature, you must grant access to display notifications.
By enabling this feature, you will receive a notification each time your battery is charged to the selected level.
By enabling this function, you will receive a notification every time the battery level drops to the selected level.
If desired, you can change the size of the widget. It can be done in this way.

For the widget to work correctly, it is necessary to ensure the constant operation of the service. If you see this notification in your notification bar, then the widget should work properly. Otherwise, restart the application to restore the widget.
Unfortunately, due to the fact that your phone does not have the required sensor, this function is not available to you.
\tThis graph shows how the battery percentage has changed over the time period you selected.
Notify when the device is discharging
Notify when the device is charging
Error accessing the file. Try again.

"For this feature to work correctly, you must grant permission to read usage history. BatteryOne will be able to receive data about when and what applications you use.
BatteryOne does not share this data with third parties. BatteryOne requests this data only at the moment when it is necessary to calculate statistics. You may revoke this permission at any time."
Choose whether you want to receive a notification every time your battery reaches the selected percentage. You can turn this feature off at any time.
By enabling this feature, you will receive a notification whenever the battery temperature rises above the selected level.
You can disconnect your phone from charging.

The Full Screen Alert feature is exclusively available with %1$s, but it may not be compatible with your device. To ensure it works for you, we offer a free one-day trial. After the trial ends, the feature will be locked. To regain access, simply upgrade to %1$s. \n\nWould you like to start your trial now?
Full Screen Alert: Unlock Full Screen Alert feature without limitations.

Attention: This feature is experimental and may not function on all devices. 
Before using it, please: 
	1. Grant all required permissions. 
	2. Familiarize yourself with the meaning of the alert screen buttons. 
Failure to do so may prevent the alert from working properly.

Due to differences in OS system settings across devices, granting these permissions doesn’t guarantee the Full Screen Alert will always work perfectly, but it significantly improves the chances of it functioning correctly.

For the Full Screen Alert to function properly, you need to grant several permissions. Keep in mind that the names of these permissions may vary depending on the manufacturer of your device. Below is a list of the required permissions.
Pressing this button will stop the alert. The Full Screen Alert will reappear if the session continues.
Pressing this button will disable the Full Screen Alert for the current session. If the session continues, the Full Screen Alert will not turn on again, but notifications will still be received.
Pressing this button will completely disable the Full Screen Alert. It will no longer appear in the current or future sessions. You can enable the Full Screen Alert again in the app settings.

resources.string: No advertising, full access to closed functions
Your subscription will automatically renew and continue until you cancel. You can cancel your subscription anytime.
Database management: Organize and manage battery usage data efficiently.
Advanced interface customization: Personalize the app’s appearance to match your style.
Battery Level Widget: Access battery level quickly with a customizable home screen widget.
Battery wear prediction: Estimate battery health and plan for replacements proactively.
Full version of the Usage History: No limit on the number of sessions.
